testcase.name: Create a new pet
testcase.system-out: Given the PetStore API is available.........................................passed And a pet is created........................................................passed Then the response status code should be 200.................................passed * the response header "Content-Type" should be "application/json"...........passed * the response time should be less than 2000 milliseconds...................passed * the response body field "name" should be the pet's name...................passed

testcase.name: Update pet name and status
testcase.system-out: Given the PetStore API is available.........................................passed And a pet is created........................................................passed When I update the pet's name to "luna" and status to "sold".................passed Then the response status code should be 200.................................passed

testcase.name: Upload pet image
testcase.system-out: Given the PetStore API is available.........................................passed And a pet is created........................................................passed When I upload an image for the pet..........................................passed Then the response status code should be 200.................................passed
